title: New Phishing Campaign Targets Travelers via Compromised Hotel Booking.com Accounts

content.raw: Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered a sophisticated phishing campaign that exploits compromised hotel booking accounts to defraud travellers worldwide. The campaign, which has been active since at least April 2025, leverages stolen credentials from hotel administrators to impersonate legitimate Booking.com communications and direct unsuspecting customers toward fraudulent billing pages.
